Our Services

Comprehensive geospatial solutions delivered with precision and care.

What We Offer

GIS Strategic Action & Technical Support

Development of spatial strategies, database design, application deployment and ongoing technical assistance to maximise your GIS investment.

Cadastral Surveys

Creation of registrable instruments for land titles, boundary demarcations and documentation in accordance with national standards.

Marine & Bathymetric Surveys

Vertical datum establishment, tidal observations and predictive modelling, sea‑bed and water‑level measurements for coastal engineering.

Land Information Surveys

Perimeter, layout and topographic surveys, cadastral plan production and land titling to support property development and management.

Engineering Surveys

Deformation studies, route design for roads, rail and pipelines, feasibility studies, as‑built documentation and facilities mapping.

Project Management

End‑to‑end management of construction, IT, healthcare, energy and marketing projects using Six Sigma methodologies.

Remote Sensing

Acquisition and interpretation of satellite and drone imagery for land use classification, natural resource monitoring and environmental assessment.

Data Processing & Analysis

Comprehensive GIS, survey, drone and satellite data processing, modelling and analysis to generate actionable insights.

Every project is unique. Contact us today to explore how our expertise can bring your vision to life.
